page.title: 09JEWISH EDUCATION-PRESTWICH
page.content: There are{Nurseries}and{Primary {Schools}in this area which serve the Jewish population by introducing children to the meaning and practice of Jewish life.They provide a basic education for children,teaching them how to read and write Hebrew and understand the fundamentals of Judaism At{Secondary Schools}the pupil receives a more advanced education, learning the Bible commentaries and more about the ways of the L-rd.Secular subjects are also studied to Ordinary and Advanced level,which means the school day lasts from 9-5:30 After leaving School the boys go to{ {"Yu-she-va"}which provides extra voluntary education.They learn religious topics all day long (9-10:30) and train to be upright Jewish citizens.
